long_description: enterprise architect is an agile, cost-effective modeling, design and management platform that accelerates and integrates software, business and systems development. our enterprise architects will assist your organization to clarify, align and implement your enterprise architecture requirements. our team provides expertise in implementation, transformation, organizational design, people, business & it strategy alignment. we provide cutting edge training in the mastery of enterprise architecture skills and our flagship product: enterprise architect. we can assist you with the planning and development of business, software and comprehensive enterprise architectures.
